name: Daruma Otoshi
desc: (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster you control, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change its ATK to 0 until the end of this turn. If an Xyz Monster you control would detach its material(s) to activate an effect, except the turn this card was sent to the GY, you can banish this card from your GY instead of detaching 1 material. You can only use each effect of "Daruma Otoshi" once per turn.
